alert.note: Alert for Adams; Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 6:03PM MDT until July 15 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... Eastern Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 601 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Hoyt, or 26 miles southwest of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hoyt around 605 PM MDT. Leader around 620 PM MDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
